vulnerable.commit_message:
flxdec: Don't unref() parent in the chain function

We don't own the reference here, it is owned by the caller and given to
us for the scope of this function. Leftover mistake from 0.10 porting.

https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=774897
vulnerable.cve_desc: The gst_decode_chain_free_internal function in the flxdex decoder in gst-plugins-good in GStreamer before 1.10.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory read and crash) via an invalid file, which triggers an incorrect unref call.
